name: Cow Keeper
description:
(If you have issues with lag, make sure hardware-acceleration is turned on in your browser, or download the executable version.)

Your herd is in danger. Each night, build up your bunker to protect your herd from the slaughterhouse. During the day, make decisions that will determine how those unconvinced by your portents of doom react to your plan.

7-day story mode and Endless mode.

How to build your bunker:

  • Keep clicking on the big floating cow head! It really wants you to.
  • Stone must be dug out by building a "Passage" on it.
  • Cows need food (Pastures) and water (Wells). Each cow working in one of those provides enough for 5 cows, including themselves.
  • Each room can fit up to 4 cows in it. Cows can't move through full rooms.
  • Once a cow enters any room other than a passage, they will not choose to leave it for the rest of the night. They will only move between adjacent rooms of the same type.
  • Cows are stupid and will wander randomly until they can't find a place to go anymore.
  • Other rooms provide help and bonuses during nightly and daytime events.
  • You can speed up time by holding Shift.
